markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Golden League Xun Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2734) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Fists of the Ruby Phoenix</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 76</row>

**Archetype** [Golden League Xun](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=93)

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Underworld Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8)

</column>

---

You are a xun for the Golden League, aiding the organization. You gain expert proficiency in two of the following skills (or in two other skills of your choice in which you're trained, if you were already an expert in the listed skills): [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3), [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5), [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7), or [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15). In addition, if you use Underworld Lore to [Earn Income](/Actions.aspx?ID=23) or [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26), when you get a success, you get a critical success instead.

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the Golden League Xun archetype.

<title level="2">Golden League Xun Dedication leads to...</title>
[Beneath Notice](/Feats.aspx?ID=2735), [Menacing Prowess](/Feats.aspx?ID=2736), [Rope Mastery](/Feats.aspx?ID=2737), [Silent Sting](/Feats.aspx?ID=2738)
name: Golden League Xun Dedication
